tool_description: Generate a video with a professional spokesperson based on a provided script.
name: VIDEOBOLT.COM Spokesperson Videos
title: VIDEOBOLT.COM Spokesperson Videos

api_list.name: Create Recording (1 Day)
api_list.description: Create a spokesperson recording with delivery in one business day.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://videobolt-com-spokesperson-videos.p.rapidapi.com/create/deadline/1day/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "videobolt-com-spokesperson-videos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
